description: This file defines a React component called ProtectedRoute, which is used to guard components or pages based on user authentication and administrative privileges. It redirects unauthenticated users to the login page and non-admin users to the home page.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, requireAdmin = false })
methods.description: React functional component that enforces authentication and optional admin privileges before rendering child components.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ children, requireAdmin = false }) {$/
